sentences.sContent: a nation characterized by cultural pluralism
sentences.sCn: 以多元文化为特色的国家

phrases.pCn: 文化多元主义；文化多元性

remMethod.val: plural (复数的； 多元的) + ism (表示名词) → 复数

words.tran: 兼职者；多元论者；兼管数个教堂者

trans.tranCn: 多元化， 多元性； 兼职
trans.tranOther: when people of many different races, religions, and political beliefs live together in the same society, or the belief that this can happen successfully
